Header: Gnanasara Thera visits Rathana Thera who is engaged in a fast; Raththota shops closed in support of the fast
Content: General Secretary of the Bodu Bala Sena Organization Venerable Galagoda-aththe Gnanasara Thera today visited the Sri Dalada Maligawa in Kandy to look in to the wellbeing of Venerable Athuraliye Rathana Thera. MP’s Wijedasa Rajapaksa, Mahindananda Aluthgamage and Keheliya Rambukwella also visited the Thera. The fast was launched by Venerable Athuraliye Rathana Thera on Friday over 4 demands including the removal of Minister Rishard Bathiutheen, and Governors Asath Salley and M L A M Hizbullah from their positions. Meanwhile, all shops in Raththota – Matale have been closed in support of Rathana Thera’s fast.
